txt.en: 'Trolls do good. You do good too. We smash and crash and bash! Târks die!'

'Trolls tough. You weak. You work. Trolls fight. You go, let troll come. You go now...'\n\nYou are uncertain if this is a request or an order. Though it is clear, if you choose you can retreat from the Ettenmoors and allow a troll to enter in your stead.
Slaughter the Free People

Shifting from side to side the behemoth seems to take a moment to notice your presence. Finally, its eyes come to rest upon you and it breathes heavy and foetid breath into your face.

'Go to Angmar. Troll come here. You work and troll fight. We win fast.'

Perhaps if you tell the troll you will work a troll will come here to the Ettenmoors in your stead.
'Trolls fight. You die too fast. We strong where you weak. You go to troll home. Troll come here and fight. We win war. Take all. I send troll home when done.'\n\n
Angmar controls Lugazag
'You go now. Troll come here.'
'Trolls do good. You do good too. We shamsh and crash and bash! Târks die!'
'You go now. Troll come here.'
'Trolls do good. You do good too. We shamsh and crash and bash! Târks die!'

Taskmaster Sharkúlob is at Gramsfoot in the Ettenmoors.\n\nThe trolls from Angmar, in an effort to speed the victory of Angmar's army, are willing to come to the Ettenmoors to fight the Free Peoples in exchange for your services in the North. You should speak with Taskmaster Sharkûlob.
'You go now. Troll come here.'
'Trolls do good. You do good too. We shamsh and crash and bash! Târks die!'
Taskmaster Sharkûlob is at Gramsfoot in the Ettenmoors.\n\nYou took the place of a troll in Angmar while it wrought destruction against the forces of the Free Peoples in the Ettenmoors.
'You go now. Troll come here.'
'Trolls do good. You do good too. We shamsh and crash and bash! Târks die!'
'You go now. Troll come here.'
Talk to Taskmaster Sharkúlob at Gramsfoot and complete a patrol through the Ettenmoors as a Troll (Cost: 500 Commendations)
Talk to Taskmaster Sharkúlob at Gramsfoot
Talk to Taskmaster Sharkúlob at Gramsfoot
'Trolls do good. You do good too. We shamsh and crash and bash! Târks die!'
'Trolls do good. You do good too. We shamsh and crash and bash! Târks die!'
The trolls of Angmar have a singular vision, one that involves destroying the enemies of Angmar.

'Trolls fight. You die too fast. We strong where you weak.

'You go to troll-home now. Troll come here and fight. We win war. Take all. I send troll home when done.'
